The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 September is 304,269 (540.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 04 September, there were 11,704 new confirmed cases (20.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 August, there were 7,355 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 59% (4349 extra cases).
